title: Anna Karenina
description: The story of adultery in the Oblonsky household, where Dolly discovers husband Stiva's affair with a former governess. Stiva's sister, Anna Karenina, arrives to help keep the Russian family together. Anna takes her own lover, Count Vronsky, introducing a downward spiral in her marriage to Karenina and her union with Vronsky. Anna's life ends in suicide.
author: Leo Tolstoy
